text: UAllâh Wenze iKa’bha ukuba ibe nguMzi oNgcwele, ibe ligwiba lokhuseleko nenzuzo yoluntu, ndawonye neenyanga eziNgcwele nezilwanyana zomnikelo (nabantu abaphawulwe ngezidanga okanye izilwanyana eziphawulwe ngezidanga ezenziwengamaxoloemithiyaseMakkahngenxayokhuseleko lwazo). Khon’ukuze nazi okokuba uAllâh Unolwazi lwako konke okusemazulwini nokusemhlabeni nokuba uAllâh nguMazi weento zonke
